page.title: 14Housing in the Cowtons
page.content: Most housing is owner occupied. There are many farm houses and cottages, all differing in style and character. There is a high proportion of bungalows in N Cowton. Building work has been carried out more recently in E Cowton, where a large estate was started in the early 1970's. There are 10 Council owned houses in N Cowton, and a similar number in E Cowton. There are 12 Senior Citizen bungalows in N Cowton, and 15 in E Cowton, some of these have been rented to families. Building continues with a small estate near E Cowton school. A village plan has restricted building to specific areas in N Cowton. This is to avoid ribbon development which has been a feature of the village. Almost all of the older properties in the area have been modernised, and command quite high prices when up for sale.
